item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数增幅超过预期
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数增幅超过预期，这可能暗示关税导致裁员人数回升，而关税在第一季度对经济造成了拖累。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for unemployment benefits increased more than expected last week, potentially hinting at a pick-up in layoffs from tariffs, which weighed on the economy in the first quarter.】

item.title: 雅戈尔称正在重新评估芝浦电子的收购条件
item.description: 台湾电子零件制造商雅居乐周四表示，正在重新评估其对日本芝浦电子公司（Shibaura Electronics）的要约收购条件，这是在其竞争对手提高出价后采取的举措。【原文：Taiwanese electronic parts maker Yageo said on Thursday it was re-evaluating the terms of its tender offer for Japan's Shibaura Electronics , a move that came after its rival suitor raised its bidding price.】

item.title: 独家报道印度航空公司认为巴基斯坦的空域禁令将在 12 个月内使其损失 6 亿美元，因此寻求援助
item.description: 路透社看到的一封印度航空公司的信函显示，如果巴基斯坦的空域禁令持续一年，印度航空公司预计将面临约 6 亿美元的额外成本，并已要求联邦政府赔偿损失。【原文：Air India expects to face around $600 million in additional costs if a ban from Pakistan's airspace lasts for a year, and has asked the federal government to compensate it for the hit, a company letter seen by Reuters shows.】

item.title: 由于电费上涨，Exelon 第一季度利润超出预期
item.description: 受电费上涨的影响，美国公用事业公司 Exelon 周四公布的第一季度利润超过了华尔街的预期。【原文：U.S. utility Exelon surpassed Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Thursday, helped by higher electricity rates.】

item.title: 好时因北美零食需求旺盛而实现强劲季度业绩
item.description: 好时公司周四公布的第一季度销售额降幅小于预期，利润超出预期，主要得益于北美市场对咸味零食业务的稳定需求。【原文：Hershey posted a smaller-than-expected drop in sales for the first quarter and beat profit estimates on Thursday, helped by steady demand for its salty snacks business in North America.】

item.title: 万事达卡第一季度利润因消费者支出回升而大幅增长
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税政策引发了经济不确定性，但万事达卡（Mastercard）周四公布第一季度利润大增，原因是其银行卡网络的消费恢复了活力。【原文：Mastercard reported a surge in first-quarter profit on Thursday after resilient spending in its card network despite the economic uncertainty sparked by U.S. President Donald Trump's tariff policies.】

item.title: 不惧关税不确定性，Roblox 提高年度预订量预期
item.description: Roblox 周四上调了年度预订额预期，季度业绩超过预期，这表明尽管美国关税引发了经济不确定性，但其庞大的用户生成电子游戏库的支出仍在保持增长。【原文：Roblox raised its annual bookings forecast on Thursday and beat quarterly results estimates, a sign that spending on its vast library of user-generated videogames was holding up despite economic uncertainty driven by U.S. tariffs.】

item.title: 美国财政部长敦促美联储降息
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周四呼吁美国联邦储备委员会降息，称两年期利率收益率低于美联储基金利率。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Thursday called on the U.S. Federal Reserve to cut rates, saying yields on two-year rates were lower than Fed fund rates.】

item.title: 汇丰银行主席马克-塔克将于年底退休
item.description: 汇丰银行周四表示，集团主席马克-塔克打算在 2025 年底前退休。【原文：HSBC said on Thursday that group Chairman Mark Tucker intended to retire by the end of 2025.】

item.title: 医疗设备制造商 Becton Dickinson 因潜在关税打击下调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 由于预计美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税可能会对公司造成打击，医疗设备制造商拜登迪金森公司（Becton Dickinson）周四下调了年度利润预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌了5%。【原文：Medical device maker Becton Dickinson lowered its annual profit forecast on Thursday, in anticipation of a potential hit from U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs, sending its shares down 5% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 法院裁定，苹果必须在英国专利纠纷案中一次性支付 Optis 5.02 亿美元
item.description: 伦敦上诉法院周四裁定，苹果公司必须向一家美国专利持有者支付 5.02 亿美元，因为苹果公司在 iPhone 和 iPad 等设备中使用了 4G 专利，这是一场旷日持久的法律战的最新阶段。【原文：Apple must pay a U.S. patent holder $502 million for the use of 4G patents in devices including iPhones and iPads, London's Court of Appeal ruled on Thursday, in the latest stage of a long-running legal battle.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司 ICE 第一季度利润因交易量强劲而增长
item.description: 洲际交易所（Intercontental Exchange）周四公布，受益于能源和期权部门的强劲交易量，第一季度利润有所增长。【原文：Intercontinental Exchange reported an increase in first-quarter profit on Thursday, benefiting from strong trading volumes in energy and options segments.】

item.title: 广达季度利润超预期，上调年度利润预期
item.description: 受基础设施服务需求持续走强的影响，能源承包商广达服务公司（Quanta Services）周四公布的第一季度利润超出预期，并上调了全年业绩预期。【原文：Energy contractor Quanta Services beat first-quarter profit estimates and raised its annual forecast on Thursday, aided by sustained strength in demand for its infrastructure services.】

item.title: 招聘公司 Challenger 称，4 月份美国宣布的裁员人数下降
item.description: 4 月份，美国雇主宣布的裁员人数有所下降，但在关税导致经济前景不明朗的情况下，企业仍然不愿增加招聘。【原文：Layoffs announced by U.S. employers dropped in April, but companies remained resistant to boost hiring amid an uncertain economic outlook because of tariffs.】

item.title: 豪迈航空航天公司因零部件需求强劲而上调 2025 年利润预期
item.description: 豪迈宇航公司（Howmet Aerospace）周四上调了 2025 年的利润预期，原因是随着飞机制造商努力生产更多喷气式飞机，对这家美国供应商的紧固件和其他关键飞机零部件的需求强劲。【原文：Howmet Aerospace on Thursday raised its 2025 profit forecast on robust demand for the U.S. supplier's fasteners and other critical aircraft parts as planemakers try to produce more jets.】

item.title: 开利全球季度利润超出预期，暖通空调需求强劲，上调 2025 年业绩预期
item.description: 开利全球公司周四公布的第一季度利润超过了分析师的预期，并上调了 2025 年的业绩预期，预计市场对其供暖、通风与空调（HVAC）产品和售后维修服务的需求强劲。【原文：Carrier Global beat the analysts' estimate for first-quarter profit on Thursday, and raised its 2025 forecast, anticipating strong demand for its heating, ventilating and air conditioning (HVAC) products and aftermarket repair services.】

item.title: 早间竞标经济停滞的科技滋补品
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 空气化工产品公司下调全年利润预期，股价下跌
item.description: 空气化工产品公司（Air Products）周四下调了年度利润预期，这家工业气体生产商公布的季度收益低于预期，受销量下降和成本上升的影响，该公司股价盘前下跌了 4%。【原文：Air Products cut its annual profit forecast on Thursday and the industrial gas maker reported lower-than-expected quarterly earnings, hurt by lower sales volumes and higher costs, sending the company's shares down 4% premarket.】

item.title: 关税混乱打击消费者信心，麦当劳全球销售额意外下滑
item.description: 麦当劳周四公布的第一季度全球可比销售额意外下降，原因是混乱的关税引发的不确定性导致其主要市场中资金短缺的食客需求减弱。【原文：McDonald's posted a surprise decline in first-quarter global comparable sales on Thursday, as demand from cash-strapped diners in its key markets faltered on uncertainty sparked by chaotic tariffs.】

item.title: 哈雷戴维森公司因关税问题下调年度预测
item.description: 哈雷戴维森公司（Harley-Davidson）周四暂停了其年度预测，因为这家摩托车制造商正在应对与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税有关的逆风。【原文：Harley-Davidson on Thursday suspended its annual forecasts as the motorbike maker navigates headwinds related to U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: KKR 的利润因收费增长和保险部门实力增强而攀升
item.description: 周四，KKR 公布第一季度利润大幅增长，主要得益于更高的费用和保险业务的稳健收益。【原文：KKR reported a jump in first-quarter profit on Thursday, buoyed by higher fees and solid gains in its insurance business.】

item.title: 礼来第一季度业绩强劲，但减肥药销售令人失望
item.description: 礼来公司（Eli Lilly）周四公布的第一季度收入和利润均好于预期，但其畅销减肥药 Zepbound 的销售额略低于华尔街预期，导致其股价在盘前交易中下跌 2%。【原文：Eli Lilly on Thursday posted better-than-expected first quarter revenue and profit, although sales of its popular weight-loss drug, Zepbound, came in slightly below Wall Street estimates, sending its shares down 2% in premarket trading.】

item.title: 汤森路透在经济动荡中重申 2025 年财务预测
item.description: 在关税引发的全球经济动荡导致一些公司修改或完全取消预测的情况下，汤森路透周四重申了 2025 年的财务指导。【原文：Thomson Reuters on Thursday reaffirmed 2025 financial guidance amid tariff-induced global economic turmoil that has led some companies to revise or scrap forecasts altogether.】

item.title: 由于罕见病药物需求强劲，百健公司季度利润超出预期
item.description: 由于对罕见病药物的强劲需求帮助抵消了多发性硬化症药物销售额的下降，百健公司周四公布的第一季度利润和收入均超出预期。【原文：Biogen beat first-quarter profit and revenue expectations on Thursday, as strong demand for its rare disease drugs helped offset declining sales of its multiple sclerosis drugs.】

item.title: 庞巴迪季度收入增长19%，得益于交付能力增强和服务收入增加
item.description: 加拿大公务机制造商庞巴迪公司周四公布，由于飞机交付量增加和售后服务增长，公司第一季度收入增加。【原文：Canadian business jet manufacturer Bombardier reported higher first-quarter revenue on Thursday, owing to increased aircraft deliveries and growth in aftermarket services.】

item.title: CVS Health 上调年度利润预期，扭亏为盈势头强劲
item.description: 由于各项业务表现强劲，CVS Health 周四上调了全年利润预期，这标志着这家医疗保健企业集团在去年遭遇一系列麻烦后已提前复苏。【原文：CVS Health raised its full-year profit forecast on Thursday following strong performance across its businesses, signaling an early recovery after a series of troubles hit the healthcare conglomerate last year.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Zoho 暂停 7 亿美元芯片制造计划，印度遭遇最新挫折
item.description: 熟悉内情的消息人士透露，印度软件公司 Zoho 已暂停了长达一年之久的斥资 7 亿美元进军芯片制造的计划，这对印度政府雄心勃勃的半导体计划造成了又一次打击。【原文：Indian software firm Zoho has suspended its year-long pursuit of a $700 million plan to foray into chip manufacturing, sources familiar with the matter said, dealing another blow to the Indian government's ambitious semiconductor plans.】

item.title: 通用汽车下调 2025 年利润预期，关税影响高达 50 亿美元
item.description: 在本周白宫就汽车关税问题做出一些澄清和缓和之后，通用汽车公司周四下调了 2025 年的利润预期。【原文：General Motors cut its 2025 profit forecast on Thursday after receiving some clarity and reprieve from the White House this week on automotive tariffs.】

item.title: Moderna 第一季度利润和销售额超出华尔街预期
item.description: Moderna 周四公布的第一季度利润和销售额超过了华尔街的预期，这得益于该公司在大流行后对其 COVID-19 疫苗的需求减弱后削减成本的努力。【原文：Moderna on Thursday reported first-quarter profit and sales that beat Wall Street estimates, helped by the company's cost-cutting efforts following waning post-pandemic demand for its COVID-19 vaccine.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税后，英国央行可能发出加快降息的信号
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税令全球经济增长前景暗淡，英国央行预计将于5月8日降息四分之一个百分点，一些经济学家认为英国央行很快就需要加快其渐进式降息的步伐。【原文：The Bank of England is expected to lower interest rates by a quarter point on May 8 as U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs darken the global growth outlook, and some economists think the BoE will soon need to speed up its gradual approach to rate cuts.】
